title: Lionheart
lyrics: Your light is inside of me Like a raging roar Like an ocean born Your voice is serenity When the Sun goes down And the strength I've found Our story binds us Like right and wrong Your hand in mine Marching to the beat of the storm And we walk together into the light And my love will be your armor tonight And we stand together facing a war We are lionhearts You're here like a silhouette When the darkness rules You're the brightest moon The story binds us Like right and wrong Your hand in mine Marching to the beat of the storm And we walk together into the light And my love will be your armor tonight And we stand together facing a war We are lionhearts You're never far from where I am Like a lighthouse, bring me home You're never far from me Let your spirit glow And we walk together into the light And my love will be your armor tonight And we stand together facing a war We are lionhearts And we walk together into the light And my love will be your armor tonight We are lionhearts.
